blog.name: hi-pot-and-news
blog.title: "Wha'cha Writin', Sugar?"
blog.description: Writer; poet; general complainer • She/They (or He; it doesn't bother me) • CAUTION: I post mainly fandom-related things, primarily Harry Potter • My fanfiction | My tip jar • I repost poetry from my Instagram, @purpleprosodies • Commissions for fics and poetry are ever open • I post witch ish on my side-blog: Val The Sigilist

summary: Do you know any good AU first year fics for Harry Potter or even fics that gets him to take control of his life?  I don't mind...
question: Do you know any good AU first year fics for Harry Potter or even fics that gets him to take control of his life?  I don't mind bashing fics if it is well reasoned.  Crossovers are perfectly fine as well. I'm craving please.
answer:
The first one that came to mind was Harry Potter and the Gift of Memories by Engulfing Silence, but that’s a fairly popular one, so you might have already read that.

Lemme scroll through my saved folder and followed list.

There’s The Pureblood Pretense by murkybluematter, another popular one, and it’s the first in a series that spans several years, starting in first. Fem!Harry, AU living Lily and James, a political fic, and it’s very much Harry taking control of her life.

A New Chance Continued by pyrodaemon. It’s old and has been discontinued, but it’s a good time-travel fic. Has an interesting take on magic, and delves into the backgrounds of some characters before it was made canon-uncompliant from Pottermore info

 A Study in Magic by Book of Changes. Crossover with BBC Sherlock. Fem!John and Sherlock raising Harry as their child.

A Study in Magic by Vixit. Crossover with the OG Sherlock Holmes series. Sherlock raises Harry who then goes on to deduce his way through first year.

Behind the Veil by StycianLeo. Harry travels to another dimension and takes over his female counterpart. It’s very AU, Lily and James lived, Harry has a little sister, Grindlewald mentored Voldemort who secretly works at Hogwarts as Tom Riddle, and Dumbledore’s side is not that great either. Fantastic read even though it’s been on hiatus for years.

Better Be Slytherin! by jharad17. I never finished it, but it does take place in first year, though I don’t think it counts as Harry taking control of his life. He tries at least?

Other People’s Magic by Mr. Ragtop. It’s been abandoned, but the story is great, and it has a really interesting take on magic.

Poison Pen by GenkaiFan. Not a first year fic, but very much Harry taking charge of his life.

The Thief of Hogwarts by Bluminous. Very much an adventure fic, lots of laughs. Harry does what he wants and benefits so much from his mischief. It’s abandoned, but still a pretty long read.

The Magic of Deduction by AlexisJames92. crossover with BBC Sherlock. Basically, the main cast of Sherlock died and are reincarnated as Harry and his friends. Actually a really good read despite my shitty summation. It’s also a Ron/Harry fic, with John Watson as Ron and Sherlock as Harry. Starts a bit before first year, and continues on, but a good chunk of it is first year.

Again and Again by Athey. You’ve probably read this – Athey’s work is in a league of their own – but I couldn’t not suggest it. Time travel, Master of Death shenanigans, Harry giving no shits what anyone wants from him – he is utterly in control of every aspect of his life.

Harry Potter: Dark Memories by Blueowl. Very much an AU first year. Time travel with Snape in this one, and quite a bit of change to canon as well. I forcibly made myself forget the epilogue because it ruined the rest of the story for me, but other than that, I love it.

A Jaded Family by GiuliaZe crossover fic with Katekyo Hitman Reborn! Features a Fem!Harry post Hogwarts and war retrieving Teddy from a kidnapping and learning about her mafia relation. Still on-going, but very good.

Grim Grinning Ghosts by oniforever. Has both zombie- and ghost-Harry. 

Please, let me know if you’ve already read any of these or even all of them. I can recommend more from my AO3 following list.

title: Harry Potter a Ohnivý pohár
body:
“Severusi,” řekl Brumbál a otočil se ke Snapeovi, “vy víte, oč vás teď musím požádat. Pokud jste ochoten to udělat… Pokud jste připraven…”

“Jsem,” řekl Snape.

“Pak tedy mnoho štěstí,” popřál mu Brumbál a se stínem obav ve tváři ho sledoval, jak beze slova vyšel za Siriusem.

Albatros 2001, překlad Vladimír Medek, str. 555

blog.name: drarryismehotp
blog.title: Drarry Is My Otp
blog.description: Hi! Im Ona and the proudest slytherin out there. I would love to chat and i really hope you enjoy my writing❤️

summary: Harry walked over to the bar. after all that training he needed something to drink. he waled to his seat and started looking...
body:
Harry walked over to the bar. after all that training he needed something to drink. he waled to his seat and started looking around the bar. it wasn’t crowded and harry liked it that way. when he came here he always thought of him. thought of the fight. thought what had happend if he haid stopped him..

and thats when he saw him. Draco fucking Malfoy sittin across the room making eyes with some guy.

not that harry was jealous. after all it had been 3 years 4 months and 26 days (not that he was counting) sience he said goodbye to Draco Malfoy at grimmuald place where they lived together just because Draco had won a cooking schoolarship in france. but harry was cool with this. Draco with another guy. and at the worst possible moment Draco saw him. that git had the audacity to walk towards harry. 

- Hi,Harry.

- Draco. i see that you’ve come here with a date so i wouldn’t actually want to disturb you 

- Oh please! you’re as thrilled about him as i am

- What is that supposed to mean

-When you figure it out give me a call

And then he walked away. so harry did the next best thing.

-Draco ,wait. wanna have dinner with me this Sunday?

-Sure

                                                  …

It was date night and harry had no idea what to fucking wear. so he called Pansy. He was glad for his friendship with her although she could be a pain in the ass sometime

- Hello to the most beautiful girl on the planet 

-What do you want Potter

- Help me pick an outfit for my date with Draco

- Ill be there in five

Pansy worked her magic like alwyas and with the blink of an eye harry was ready. He was wearing butgendy robes and high boots that fitted him perfectly. Harry arrived at the restaurant just in time only to see a freaking adonis walk towards him. Draco was wearing tight black jeans and a white button up. Harry swore that man only got hotter

- Wow Draco, ummm… hi

- Surprized to see me

- Actually for a moment i thought you weren’t coming

- For i moment i thought i wasn’t coming too

Dinner went fluently for the most part but then when silence took over Draco slammed his fist on the table.

- Ok you know what, this is enough! what do you want from me Potter?

And thats when Harrys emotions spilled on the table.

- What do you mean! I wanted YOU draco but you fucking took of to France didn’t you!

- Why didn’t you stop me? Why didn’t you run after me?

- Because i wanted you to be happy!

- Happy? Happy? Harry these years have been the worst years of my life. I was miserable. I couldn’t stop thinking of you!

-Then why didn’t you ever write to me.

- I did. thousands of times. I sent them to grimmuald place but you were the one who never awsered…

- Fuck it Malfoy, i moved out. I couldn’t stay there anymore. not after Sirius, not after you.

- Stop playing games Potter. I saw you okay… I came back from France a month later and i saw you kissing him. I saw you kissing Theodore Nott.

And just there harry burst out laughing.

- Draco, we were practicing for a play. He had to kiss with a male character and he asked me to rehearse with him.

Draco stood up and walked over to harry. He slapped him but before Harry could say a word Draco grabbed his face and kissed him.

Everything was a blur but then they both realized. things didn’t have to be clear for them to realize they belonged with eachother. All those years and letters, all those apologies and nights crying melted over that kiss. Becuse that kiss showed them that between Harry and Draco things would never be over.

and thats when he saw him. Draco fucking Malfoy sittin across the room making eyes with some guy.

not that harry was jealous. after all it had been 3 years 4 months and 26 days (not that he was counting) sience he said goodbye to Draco Malfoy at grimmuald place where they lived together just because Draco had won a cooking schoolarship in france. but harry was cool with this. Draco with another guy. and at the worst possible moment Draco saw him. that git had the audacity to walk towards harry. 

- Hi,Harry.

- Draco. i see that you’ve come here with a date so i wouldn’t actually want to disturb you 

- Oh please! you’re as thrilled about him as i am

- What is that supposed to mean

-When you figure it out give me a call

And then he walked away. so harry did the next best thing.

-Draco ,wait. wanna have dinner with me this Sunday?

-Sure

                                                  …

It was date night and harry had no idea what to fucking wear. so he called Pansy. He was glad for his friendship with her although she could be a pain in the ass sometime

- Hello to the most beautiful girl on the planet 

-What do you want Potter

- Help me pick an outfit for my date with Draco

- Ill be there in five

Pansy worked her magic like alwyas and with the blink of an eye harry was ready. He was wearing butgendy robes and high boots that fitted him perfectly. Harry arrived at the restaurant just in time only to see a freaking adonis walk towards him. Draco was wearing tight black jeans and a white button up. Harry swore that man only got hotter

- Wow Draco, ummm… hi

- Surprized to see me

- Actually for a moment i thought you weren’t coming

- For i moment i thought i wasn’t coming too

Dinner went fluently for the most part but then when silence took over Draco slammed his fist on the table.

- Ok you know what, this is enough! what do you want from me Potter?

And thats when Harrys emotions spilled on the table.

- What do you mean! I wanted YOU draco but you fucking took of to France didn’t you!

- Why didn’t you stop me? Why didn’t you run after me?

- Because i wanted you to be happy!

- Happy? Happy? Harry these years have been the worst years of my life. I was miserable. I couldn’t stop thinking of you!

-Then why didn’t you ever write to me.

- I did. thousands of times. I sent them to grimmuald place but you were the one who never awsered…

- Fuck it Malfoy, i moved out. I couldn’t stay there anymore. not after Sirius, not after you.

- Stop playing games Potter. I saw you okay… I came back from France a month later and i saw you kissing him. I saw you kissing Theodore Nott.

And just there harry burst out laughing.

- Draco, we were practicing for a play. He had to kiss with a male character and he asked me to rehearse with him.

Draco stood up and walked over to harry. He slapped him but before Harry could say a word Draco grabbed his face and kissed him.

Everything was a blur but then they both realized. things didn’t have to be clear for them to realize they belonged with eachother. All those years and letters, all those apologies and nights crying melted over that kiss. Becuse that kiss showed them that between Harry and Draco things would never be over.
trail.content:
Harry walked over to the bar. after all that training he needed something to drink. he waled to his seat and started looking around the bar. it wasn’t crowded and harry liked it that way. when he came here he always thought of him. thought of the fight. thought what had happend if he haid stopped him..

and thats when he saw him. Draco fucking Malfoy sittin across the room making eyes with some guy.

not that harry was jealous. after all it had been 3 years 4 months and 26 days (not that he was counting) sience he said goodbye to Draco Malfoy at grimmuald place where they lived together just because Draco had won a cooking schoolarship in france. but harry was cool with this. title: Harry Potter a Ohnivý pohár
body:
Když si Nevile představil, že by měl k Moodymu zajít na čaj, tvářil se ještě zděšeněji. Ani se nepohnul a nepromluvil jediné slovo.

Moody teď sklouzl čarodějným okem na Harryho. “Vy jste v pořádku, Pottere, že ano?”

“Jistě,” odtušil Harry málem vzdorně.

Modré oko se Moodymu lehce chvělo v důlku, jak si Harryho prohlížel.

“Musíte to vědět,” řekl potom. “Možná to zní krutě, ale vy to musíte vědět. Nemá smysl si cokoliv namlouvat…”

Albatros 2001, překlad Vladimír Medek, str. 175

tags: fantastic beasts and where to find them
summary: Headcanons or imagine of what it would be like to be dating Percival Graves and being deaf?
question: Headcanons or imagine of what it would be like to be dating Percival Graves and being deaf?
answer:
• This man may seem like he is the stereotypical ‘all work and no time for his s/o’ ,but trust me, he would be so devoted to his s/o
  • He starts to learn sign language from the second his meets you, before you are even dating
  • He would practice it until he was fluent


  • He’s not great at letting people read his lips purely because he often has his hands covering his mouth or his expressions don’t match up to what he’s saying
  • Doesn’t want to make his s/o feel like he has to be their interpreter when he brings them to work balls/evenings so would start mandatory sign language classes for all employees
  • Is comfortable with silence, likes to just sit with his s/o as they read
  • This man would go out of his way to make sure his s/o felt as comfortable and casual with their deafness as possible,would never want this feeling like a hassle because they’re not at all
  • Often will use magic as a way to illustrate what he’s talking about if he’s feeling playful or will use it to tell a story so his s/o can see it rather than the signs
  • He catches himself signing even when he’s not with his s/o
  • Will start charities that fund education on and for deaf and blind children because he suddenly realised just how difficult daily life can be, mainly because of the ignorance of people, especially in the wizarding community
  • Basically this man is just so in love and so impressed by s/o


(I loved this ask! I also know basic bsl so it was really fun to think about how he would be with a deaf s/o! 💕)

summary: Am I the only one who would rather have a show or book set based on the founders of Hogwarts then the Mauraurders (sorry if...
body:
Am I the only one who would rather have a show or book set based on the founders of Hogwarts then the Mauraurders (sorry if that’s miss spelt) ?

It’s just, I don’t really want anyone to ruin them. We have a nice picture of James, Sirius, Remus, and Peter. I feel it would just be a let down if it became something.

Bit we don’t know an awful lot about the founders. I think it would nice to see how they we together. Witness the friendship built, the creation of the school, the first sorting ceremony, the spat that made Slytherin leave. I’d like that.

TL/DR: I like the world we’ve created for the Mauraurders, and don’t want it ruined. Create the founders instead

blog.description:
I’m in my 30s, based in London. Lighting technician. Freelance photographer. Guinea pigs are Spud & Brussel. I also have fish. Asks and requests are always welcome and you’re welcome to do anything with my headcanons (fic, art…whatever). 
Proud Slytherin // Pro Snape

tags: severus and harry figuring things out
summary: Severus is scared of sudden movements and sometimes of men who are bigger than him (bc of his father)
question: Severus is scared of sudden movements and sometimes of men who are bigger than him (bc of his father)
answer:
- Harry stood outside Azkaban in the small hours of a dreary Wednesday morning. He stuffed his hands further into his pockets and waited.

- after half an hour, the gates opened and the thin almost shambling figure of Severus Snape shuffled out. The gates slammed behind him, making him flinch.

- in the coming weeks, Harry learned to be careful around Severus. No sudden movements or loud noises.

blog.title: Carry on my wayward soul
blog.description:
There'll never be peace, because you are never done.
But just for once lay your weary head to rest.
You can cry now.
